Tips for Surviving Halloween Avoid buying candies that aren’t dialysis-friendly; that way, you are not tempted. If you have diabetes, choose sugar-free or low-sugar candies. Avoid high phosphorus and high potassium ingredients in candy-like chocolate and nuts. Take a 10 to 15-minute walk or do a physical activity for each piece of candy you eat. Share! Give away leftover candy to friends or family. Acceptable Halloween Candies for Dialysis Patients ✓ Avoid These Candies X Candy Corn, Sweet Tarts, Red Licorice Chocolate candy bars Bulls-eye, Marshmallows, Sour Balls Chocolate and nut candy bars Butterscotch, Gummy Bears Candy bars that contain nuts Jolly Ranchers, Jelly Beans Candy bars with peanut butter Gum Drops, Peppermint Toffee JuJu Beans, Lifesavers Caramel treats Red Hots, Lemon
